zimbra_domains_add_domain_select_title: Select a domain from the list
zimbra_domains_add_domain_input_title: Enter a domain name that is not managed by your OVHcloud account
zimbra_domains_add_domain_success_messag: Your add-in request has been submitted. It will be executed in a few moments.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_error_message: Unable to submit your add-in request. {{ error }}
zimbra_domains_add_domain_configuration_: How do you want to configure your DNS zone?
We configure your service to ensure the best level of security.
You can customise the configuration and choose when to switch your emails to this service.
Your domain {{domain}} will be configured in authoritative mode.
To confirm that you are the holder of the {{domain}} domain, please add this DNS record:

After uploading, please wait a few minutes for our system to process and detect your recording.
You have 48 hours to complete this validation. You can find this information later in the domains list.
Once your domain has been validated, you will need to manually edit the MX, SRV, SPF and DKIM records in your DNS zone.
You can find the information required in the diagnostics page for the associated domain.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_warning_modifi: You must ensure that the DNS zone of the chosen domain can be modified by its administrator.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_configuration_: Your ownership of the {{domain}} domain has already been confirmed. You don’t need to do anything.
We couldn’t find any information related to this domain ID.
zimbra_domains_add_domain_warning_config: By opting for the recommended configuration, you agree that all of your emails will be routed to the Zimbra service in the future. If you do not agree to this, please untick the MX box in the custom configuration.
